code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./MovieList.css";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import Cards from"../card/Card";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieList=()=>{const[movieList,setMovieList]=useState([]);const{type}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{getData();},[]);useEffect(()=>{getData();},[type]);const getData=()=>{fetch("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(type?type:"popular","?api_key=4e44d9029b1270a757cddc766a1bcb63&language=en-US")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setMovieList(data.results));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie__list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"list__title",children:(type?type:"POPULAR").toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list__cards",children:movieList.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cards,{movie:movie}))})]});};export default MovieList;
